ReturnOrderItemTax.name: ReturnOrderItemTax
ReturnOrderItemTax.description: Represents the tax on a return order line item or return order item adjustment.

Amount.description: Amount of tax represented by the return order item tax.

Description.description: Description of the return order item tax.

OrderItemTaxLineItemSummaryId.description: ID of the order item tax line item summary associated with the order item summary that corresponds to the return order line item to which the tax applies.

Rate.description: Tax rate used to calculate the Amount.

ReturnOrderId.description: ID of the associated return order.

ReturnOrderItemAdjustmentId.description: If this object represents a tax on an adjustment, this value is the ID of the return order item adjustment to which the tax applies. If this value is null, the adjustment applies to a return order line item.

ReturnOrderItemTaxNumber.description: ID of the return order item tax.

ReturnOrderLineItemId.description: If this object represents a tax on a return order line item, this value is the ID of that return order line item. If this object represents a tax on an adjustment, this value is the ID of the return order line item to which the adjustment applies.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: Date on which the Amount was calculated. Important due to tax rate changes over time.

Type.description: Shows whether the amount on the tax line is an estimate or the final calculated amount. Doesnâ€™t set a value by default. Users can define automation to set and change the value as needed.
